大麻法案的影响：魁北克孕妇大麻疾病增加《大麻法案》(CAC) 和 COVID-19 大流行对魁北克孕妇物质相关疾病的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Impact-of-Cannabis-Act-Increase-in-cannabis-disorders-among-pregnant-women-in-Quebec.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Impact-of-Cannabis-Act-Increase-in-cannabis-disorders-among-pregnant-women-in-Quebec.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24b46b25-6ef6-4ec8-9e38-6aeab3a3bc15 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 05:46:00 -0400 Impact of Cannabis Act: Increase in cannabis disorders among pregnant women in Quebec
完美之路：深入研究质量管理的持续改进这次采访探讨了持续改进的原则以及如何应用它们来增强质量管理体系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/The-path-to-perfection-A-deep-dive-into-continuous-improvement-in-quality-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/The-path-to-perfection-A-deep-dive-into-continuous-improvement-in-quality-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=119d563d-565b-4030-92da-d969f6156db2 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 05:22:00 -0400 The path to perfection: A deep dive into continuous improvement in quality management
超市预洗蔬菜隐孢子虫检测呈阳性即食、预洗蔬菜样品中存在食品和水源寄生虫小隐孢子虫。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Supermarket-pre-washed-vegetables-test-positive-for-Cryptosporidium.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Supermarket-pre-washed-vegetables-test-positive-for-Cryptosporidium.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fe11afc-6ff2-4dbd-8658-d843ef861089 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 05:01:00 -0400 Supermarket pre-washed vegetables test positive for Cryptosporidium
研究揭示代谢综合征对脑容量和认知功能的影响代谢综合征（MetS）与无痴呆成年人的认知和神经影像结果之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Study-reveals-metabolic-syndromes-impact-on-brain-volume-and-cognitive-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Study-reveals-metabolic-syndromes-impact-on-brain-volume-and-cognitive-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60ee98ec-7598-4415-bc11-9beb1d4151de Mon, 24 Jun 2024 04:30:00 -0400 Study reveals metabolic syndrome's impact on brain volume and cognitive function
间歇性禁食在治疗早期 2 型糖尿病方面优于传统药物研究表明，5:2间歇性空腹代餐饮食可以有效控制中国成人早期2型糖尿病患者的血糖水平并减轻体重。这种饮食干预在控制糖尿病和肥胖方面优于二甲双胍和恩格列净。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Intermittent-fasting-outperforms-traditional-drugs-in-managing-early-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Intermittent-fasting-outperforms-traditional-drugs-in-managing-early-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d367ea58-8bd3-47ac-b50c-123cb74735a0 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 00:31:00 -0400 Intermittent fasting outperforms traditional drugs in managing early type 2 diabetes
正念冥想通过改变大脑反应来抑制游戏成瘾正念冥想可显着降低患有网络游戏障碍的成年人的游戏渴望和成瘾严重程度。该研究揭示了与渴望相关的大脑区域的激活减少，例如豆状核和内侧额叶回。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/Mindativity-meditation-curbs-gaming-addiction-by-altering-brain-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/Mindativity-meditation-curbs-gaming-addiction-by-altering-brain-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f06e8630-d410-4198-b842-39d366b2f63b Sun, 23 Jun 2024 23:33:00 -0400 Mindfulness meditation curbs gaming addiction by altering brain responses
围产期抑郁症可能增加心血管疾病风险瑞典的一项全国性研究显示，患有围产期抑郁症的女性患心血管疾病的风险增加 36%，特别是高血压、缺血性心脏病和心力衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/Perinatal-depression-may-increase-cardiovian-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/Perinatal-depression-may-increase-cardiovian-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9676353d-51d3-45a8-adf2-262ccdc276a9 Sun, 23 Jun 2024 22:52:00 -0400 Perinatal depression may increase cardiovascular disease risk
新研究警告 α-H1N2 猪流感病毒存在潜在的大流行风险猪体内的 α-H1N2 流感病毒由于能够逃避人类免疫并在物种之间传播，因此具有较高的大流行风险，这凸显了警惕监测的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/New-study-warns-of-pottial-pandemic-risk-from-ceb1-H1N2-swine-flu-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/New-study-warns-of-pottial-pandemic-risk-from-ceb1-H1N2-swine-flu-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a04c2267-4e17-4ea3-94e5-8a1c5203bac9 Sun, 23 Jun 2024 22:15:00 -0400 New study warns of potential pandemic risk from α-H1N2 swine flu virus
产前使用大麻如何影响新生儿结局？产前吸食大麻会显着增加低出生体重和胎儿死亡的风险，这凸显了需要对其在怀孕期间的危险进行更多的教育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/How-does-prenatal-cannabis-use-affect-neonatal-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/How-does-prenatal-cannabis-use-affect-neonatal-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e69a21c-983c-4ba6-83a5-afcc75cc91eb Sun, 23 Jun 2024 21:55:00 -0400 How does prenatal cannabis use affect neonatal outcomes?
绝经前切除卵巢可能加速大脑退化绝经前双侧卵巢切除术 (PBO) 与大脑白质完整性降低有关，尤其是在 40 岁之前接受 PBO 的女性，这表明潜在的长期认知影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/Ovary-removal-before-menopause-could-accelerate-brain-degenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240623/Ovary-removal-before-menopause-could-accelerate-brain-degenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ddbab00-369d-4d1a-bd25-5d9c986e3ec4 Sun, 23 Jun 2024 21:45:00 -0400 Ovary removal before menopause could accelerate brain degeneration
